Headline: Remulla: I shall run again as Governor of Cavite – Manila Bulletin
Text: CAVITE – Governor Jonvic C. Remulla announced on Thursday (March 25) his intention to seek reelection as governor of the province in 2022.Remulla made the announcement amid speculations that he’s eyeing a national position for the upcoming elections.“The assumptions that I am aiming for a national post are false,” Remulla wrote on his Facebook page. “Since the 2022 PH Election nears, I just want to set the record straight: I shall run again as Governor of Cavite.”Remulla clarified that he discusses national government-related topics on social media because those issues affect Cavite residents. He added that his work in Cavite is not yet finished.
